briefdescription.para: Initializes modules that were not initialized before scheduler start.

detaileddescription.para: This function is called after the scheduler started but before any cyclic task runs. Here modules get initialized that are not used during the startup process.

briefdescription.para: Cyclic 1ms task for the LTC measurement.
Task for system- and bmscontrol and SOX algorithms.
Task for ADC control, balancing control and isolation measurement.
Engine Task for handling of events.
Calls of functions within engine task.
